author: Maddie Stone, Jason Koebler, Jordan Pearson
title: Scientists Are Stuck on an Ice-Locked Ship in the Arctic Due to Coronavirus
description: Organizers of the MOSAiC expedition are determining the best way to bring a relief crew to the ship without spreading the virus, which could leave roughly 100 scientists and crew on board for an extra six weeks.
content: For the past six months, the German icebreaker Polarstern has been drifting through the central Arctic Ocean, intentionally frozen into the ice. A rotating cast of hundreds of scientists from all over the world have been traveling to and from the vessel for m… [+7614 chars]
